revised_title: The Transpiration Stream: A Review of Recent Advances and Challenges
tldr: This collection of papers explores the transpiration stream in plants, discussing recent advances in understanding and the challenges that remain. The transpiration stream plays a crucial role in the distribution of water and dissolved substances in plants. New analytical and exploratory techniques have led to a deeper understanding of this process, challenging some long-held beliefs and opening up new areas of investigation in plant physiology.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Physiology
